TopicTitle: XBox One EE sounds corrupted twin boar engine

Articles.Content: XBox One, sound file for Twin Boar is corrupt, produces regular pops/crackle that speeds up as engine throttle is increased. I can see this error was raised in 2018, but it is still broken on XB1 today. Any suggestions, other than to play with no engine noise for that engine?
Try backing up your saves (using a USB and transferring your save files) and reinstalling.
